info.name: MSPFA / Dark Theme
info.description: a dark theme for mspfa. what else is there to say?
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE || 14/06/2018
- accomodates for the new twitter news feed
- added semi-support for MadCreativity's mspa theme
- some stuff i dont remember

UPDATE || 03/04/2018
- fixed some issues with things not displaying correctly
- some images have borders
- new scroll bar
- almost all buttons now have a cleaner look
- lots of other stuff
